r96.en: A parent item with a tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH may not contain a child item.

r98.en: If net weight is populated on both parent and child items, then net weight of the parent must be greater than or equal to the sum of the net weight of all the children except when special item code = "DYNAMIC_ASSORTMENT".

r104.en: attribute value does not comply with attribute value as defined in the current Business Requirements Document

r105.en: Values do not comply with attribute data type as defined in the current standard.

r106.en: You can pass a null value when using a 'CORRECT' or 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' command to reset discontinuedDatetime or cancelDateTime.

r107.en: The discontinuedDateTime and the cancelDateTime were both set for the same item or the CatalogueItem and TradeItem discontinuedDatesTime and cancelDateTime were not the same.

r200.en: If isTradeItemAnOrderableUnit = true, grossWeight must be populated with a value greater than zero

r201.en: If grossWeight and netWeight are provided on the same record, grossWeight must be greater than or equal to netWeight

r202.en: Sum of quantityofNextLowerLevelTradeItem must equal totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem except when special item code = 'dynamic_assortment'. See the approved validations rule document for certification

r203.en: Attribute dataRecipient is required to be populated in a Catalogue Item Notification message.

r204.en: Gross weight (tradeItemWeight/grossWeight) must be used and have a value greater than zero when Shipping Unit Indicator (isTradeItemADespatchUnit ) equals ‘true’.

r300.en: Value for contentOwner shall be the GLN of the dataSource and informationProvider and shall be consistent in all levels of the item hierarchy within the message

r312.en: isTradeItemAnOrderableUnit must be true for at least one GTIN within a hierarchical configuration.

r314.en: minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfProduction must be greater than or equal to minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfArrival.

r325.en: Alcohol Percentage (percentageOfAlcoholByVolume) is not used. For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode), This attribute is required for all items on the lowest level of the hierarchy for Global Product Category Code.

r338.en: If the target market equals '528' (Netherlands) and the class HazardousInformationDetail is populated , then the dangerousGoodsRegulationCode in at least 1 of those iterations must equal 'ADR' or 'ZZZ'

r339.en: If dangerousGoodsRegulationCode equals 'ADR' and dangerousGoodsPackingGroup is not empty then dangerousGoodsPackingGroup must equal ('NA','I', 'II' or 'III').

r341.en: Start dates cannot occur after their corresponding end dates if both dates are populated

r345.en: The ‘Authority’ value in Sender and Receiver must be set to GS1.

r346.en: The Document Identification Standard value must be set to GS1.

r348.en: The value of Type must be set to a valid GS1 document name.

r350.en: Business Scope must be present in the response or exception message

r351.en: The value of Business Scope type must be set to GDSN

r352.en: Value of CorrelationInformation RequestingDocumentInstanceIdentifier is not recognized, it must be original message instance identifier

r354.en: The same Document ID may not be repeated within the same Command

r355.en: The same Command ID may not be repeated within the same Transaction

r356.en: The same Transaction ID may not be repeated within the same Message

r357.en: The same Document Identification InstanceIdentifier may not be repeated on multiple messages

r361.en: General XSD failure - not well formed, not referencing correct namespaces

r362.en: Minimums cannot be greater than their corresponding maximums: AttributeException/attributeName

r363.en: Must limit to 1 document type per message and 1 command type per transaction.

r382.en: If the item does not have a child item, the value of isTradeItemABaseUnit must be true.

r383.en: If the trade item has a child item the value of isTradeItemABaseUnit must be false.

r385.en: The priceSynchronisationDocumentIdentification is not unique for this relationship in Price Synchronisation.

r386.en: The priceSynchronisationDocumentIdentification is not sequential for this Price Synchronisation relationship.

r387.en: The priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification is not unique within this data source in Price Synchronisation.

r388.en: Attribute value must use code list values associated with the data type in Business Message Standard.

r389.en: The priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification in the Relationship Segment and the Relationship ID in the price synchronization header are not equal.

r390.en: CurrencyCode dataType shall be the 3 character representation found in the ISO 4217 codelist

r391.en: The LanguageCode shall be the 2-5 character representation found in the ISO 639 list.

r392.en: If incotermCodeLocation is populated, the incotermCode must also be populated.

r393.en: The priceSynchronisationConditionIdentification is not unique within this data source in Price Synchronisation.

r395.en: If conditionType equals 'BRACKET', you must provide both bracketTierMinimum and bracketRangeQualifierCode.

r398.en: If populated, the GPC Category Code must be a valid GPC value that has been implemented in GDSN.

r401.en: If conditionApplicationSequence is not empty then the conditionType must equal 'ALLOWANCE' or 'CHARGE'.

r402.en: If the conditionApplicationSequence is not empty, it must be greater than 1.

r403.en: The priceSynchronisationConditionIdentification must be unique within an information provider in Price Synchronization.

r405.en: If multiple business location ship froms exist, there can be only 1 business location ship to.

r406.en: If multiple business location ship tos exist, there can be only 1 business location ship from.

r407.en: The Target Condition must be unique within an information provider in Price Synchronization.

r408.en: If populated, the Target Condition must have an effective end date value that is not in the past.

r409.en: The Target Condition must be in the accept, synchronize or review status in the price sync list except for First Initial Load.

r410.en: If the Target Condition Type is populated, then PriceCommentaryInformation/priceType cannot be populated.

r411.en: If the Target Condition is referenced, it must be of type = bracket.

r412.en: If the PriceSynchronisationCondition is populated, the bracket tier minimum, bracket tier maximum, bracket range qualifier and bracket operator for the Item Price Type cannot be populated.

r413.en: The TargetPriceType must be unique within a information provider in Price Synchronization.

r414.en: If populated, the effectiveEndDate in the TargetPriceType cannot have a date that is in the past.

r415.en: The TargetPriceType must be in the accept, synchronize or review status in the price sync list except for First Initial Load.

r416.en: If the TargetPriceType is populated, the Price Type Code must be equal to Allowance, Charge, Promotional Price or any of the Transaction Price Types identified by the word TRANSACTION in the code list value.

r417.en: If the TargetPriceType is referenced, the PriceType code of that TargetPriceType must not be Allowance or Charge.

r420.en: All PriceTypes, other than PriceType = ‘Allowance’ or ‘Charge’, must be assigned a PriceTypeApplicationSequence = 1.

r421.en: ConditionApplicationSequence = 1 is not a valid Application Sequence for Summary Conditions.

r422.en: The priceSynchronisationDocumentIdentificationmust be present and unique within a information provider in Price Synchronization.

r423.en: Within the header, the priceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification must be present and unique within a information provider in Price Synchronization.

r424.en: If priceSynchronisationConfirmationStatusReason is Review, both Reason Code and ActionNeeded must be provided.

r425.en: The PriceSynchronisationRelationshipIdentification included in the PriceSynchronisationConfirmation must reference an existing Price Synchronisation Relationship identified by a priceSynchronsiationRelationshipIdentification.

r426.en: The PriceSynchronisationConditionIdentification included in the PriceSynchronisationConfirmation must reference an existing Price Synchronisation Condition identified by a priceSynchronsiationConditionIdentification.

r427.en: The itemPriceTypeSegmentIdentification included in the PriceSynchronisationConfirmation must reference an existing Item Price Type Segment identified by a itemPriceTypeSegmentIdentification.

r428.en: If populated, percentageOfAlcoholByVolume must be greater than or equal to 0.00 and smaller than or equal to 100.00 by definition.

r429.en: The receiving DP is failing this message because it does not support this optional functionality.

r431.en: If condition type = 'BRACKET', then Condition Value, Condition Value Type, Qualifier, Basis Quantity, Basis Quantity UOM, and Application Sequence cannot be populated.

r432.en: If Condition Type = 'BRACKET', then at least one bracket qualifier sub-class must be provided.

r434.en: If the priceTypecode is populated, then conditionType cannot be populated.

r435.en: If you provide more than one bracket qualifier in a Condition segment, then the bracket operators must either be all 'AND' or all 'OR'.

r436.en: If you provide more than one bracket qualifier in a Item Price Type segment, then the bracket operators must either be all 'AND' or all 'OR'.

r437.en: If classOfDangerousGoods is populated and dangerousGoodsRegulationCode equals 'ADR', then classOfDangerousGoods must be one of the following values: '1', '2', '3', '4.1', '4.2', '4.3', '5.1', '5.2', '6.1', '6.2', '7', '8', '9'.

r438.en: Content Owner GLN must be same as relationship segment GLN

r439.en: The price data is not valid for price synchronization because the recipient previously rejected the relationship and it is in reject state.

r440.en: The trade item is not valid for price synchronization because the recipient previously rejected a price type segment for the trade item.

r441.en: A reject segment cannot be sent on a condition segment

r442.en: If the Price Document Type is 'RESTART', the Synchronisation Header Action Code must equal ‘CHANGE_BY_REFRESH’ and all Item Price Types sent must have a Segment Action Code equal to 'ADD'.

r443.en: If a Price Synchronisation confirmationStatusReasonCode or actionNeeded is provided priceSynchronisationConfirmationStatus must be in the status of 'REVIEW'.

r444.en: If a Price SynchronisationConfirmation is received from a data recipient after a previous confirmation has been sent for the segment with priceSynchronisationConfirmationStatus of 'REJECTED', the newly received PriceSynchronisationConfirmation is invalid

r446.en: If isTradeItemPackedIrregularly equals ‘FALSE’ and tradeItemCompositionWidth, tradeItemCompositionDepth and quantityOfCompleteLayersContainedInATradeItem are all supplied and tradeItemCompositionWidth/measurementUnitCode and tradeItemCompositionDepth/measurementUnitCode equal ‘EA’ then the product of the three attributes should equal the totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem.

r448.fr: Ce GLN: #gln# a une clé de contrôle incorrecte et-ou a une taille et une valeur incorrecte

r449.en: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' then if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then netContent must not be updated.

r450.en: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' then if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then priceComparisonMeasurement must not be updated.

r451.en: The value for brandName is not allowed to be changed according to GTIN allocation rules.

r452.en: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' then if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem must not be updated.

r453.en: childTradeItem GTIN is not allowed to be changed according to GTIN allocation rules

r454.en: The GTIN cannot be a child of itself.

r455.en: A GTIN cannot be repeated under the same parent.

r456.en: isPriceOnPack may only be true for consumer units.

r457.en: One or more of the GTINs in each hierarchy must be marked as an INVOICE UNIT

r458.en: Price Type Effective Start or End Date Contexts may only repeat using a previously un-used code value

r459.en: If TargetMarket/targetMarketCountryCode is equal to ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand)), then the SegmentEffectiveEndDateInformation/effectiveEndDateTime must be a date equal to or after Today's date

r460.en: If TargetMarket/targetMarketCountryCode is equal to ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand)), then you must populate a Price Value; this value must be greater than or equal to zero.

r461.en: If TargetMarket/targetMarketCountryCode is equal to ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand)) then, if the Alternate Location Grouping is populated, then the priceTargetMarketSubdivision and shipTo locations must be empty.

r462.en: You must populate a Price Value Type as either 'VALUE' or 'PERCENTAGE'

r463.en: If TargetMarket/targetMarketCountryCode is equal to ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand)) then the reason for Price Action Reason Code must be provided

r464.en: If TargetMarket/targetMarketCountryCode is equal to ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand)) then the Trade Item Group ID Description must be the same for all GTINs within a Trade Item Group ID

r466.en: Zero or negative values are not allowed for Packaging Material Composition Quantity where provided

r469.en: For Target Market '528' (Netherlands) codes starting with 0020-0029, 0040-0049, 0200-0299 are not allowed.

r471.en: If data type is equal to gtin then attribute value must be a valid GTIN-8, GTIN-12, GTIN-13 or GTIN-14 number.

r472.en: For each GTIN in the hierarchy, populated in the next lower level trade item information the GTIN must have a corresponding item record.

r473.en: if isTradeItemPacked Irregularly = False then Value in quantityofNextLowerLevelTradeItem must be equal to value in quantityOfCompleteLayersContainedInATradeItem multiplied by value in quantityOfTradeItemsContainedInACompleteLayer

r474.en: If dataCarrierTypeCode is equal to 'EAN_8' then the first six digits of the TradeItem/GTIN shall equal '000000'.

r475.en: The Target Market Country Code and targetMarketSubdivisionCode when populated, will be consistent for all GTINs within a given hierarchy

r477.en: Unit of measures for maximum, minimum temperatures and flashPointTemperature shall be specified as degrees Celsius for this target market.

r478.en: If nestingIncrement is populated it must be greater than zero(0).

r479.en: If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '528' (Netherlands): Invalid value for trade item stacking factor

r480.en: If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '528' (Netherlands): Invalid value for the non-GTIN logistic unit stacking factor

r481.en: If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '528' (Netherlands): Invalid value for trade layers per pallet

r483.en: endAvailabilityDateTime shall be later than or equal to today on first population.

r485.en: discontinuedDateTime must only be updated with documentCommand of 'CORRECT'.

r488.en: lastChangeDateTime for a trade item must be the same or later than previously sent value

r491.en: Maximum and minimum humidity shall be expressed as a percentage with a value between '0' and '100'. E.g. '97' meaning 97%

r493.en: There is a limit of 1000 Transactions within 1 Message

r494.en: There is a limit of 1 Command type within 1 Transaction

r495.en: There is a limit of 100 Documents within 1 Transaction

r498.en: Header version in Standard Business Document Header is not the current version approved for the network. See documentation for expected value.

r500.en: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/height must not be 20 percent greater than current version height.

r501.en: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/width must not be 20 percent greater than current version width.

r502.en: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/depth must not be 20 percent greater than current version depth.

r503.en: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/grossWeight must not be 20 percent greater than current version grossWeight.

r504.en: Maximum number of iterations of GDSNTradeItemClassificationAttributeType is 25

r506.en: >For Country of Sale Code (#targetMarketCountryCode#), the Packaging Material Quantity (packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity) unit of measure #packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity# is incorrect. The unit of measure SHALL be gram (GRM) or kilogram (KGM).

r507.en: The total of values in packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity may not exceed the value in packagingWeight for the same item .

r510.en: For items that are physical, depth must be provided and value must be greater than zero (use an average for variable measure items)

r511.en: For items that are physical, height must be provided and value must be greater than zero (use an average for variable measure items)

r512.en: For items that are physical, width must be provided and value must be greater than zero (use an average for variable measure items)

r515.en: Negative values are not allowed for Gross Weight

r516.en: Zero or negative values are not allowed for Net Weight where Net Weight is Provided

r517.en: If (Audio Visual Media Product Description Module or Publication Title Rating Module or Audio Visual Media Content Information Module) are not empty and gpcCategoryCode is equal to '10001137' then audioVisualMediaProductTitle , genreTypeCodeReference , titleRatingCodeReference/Code, titleRatingCodeReference/codeListAgencyCode and gameFormatCode must not be empty.

r518.en: For targetMarketCountryCode is equal to ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand)) communityVisibilityDateTime cannot be populated if partyRecevingPrivateData (GLN) is populated.

r519.en: If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '752' (Sweden) layerHeight must have the same value as one of the values in width, depth or height of the child item.

r520.en: If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '752' (Sweden) priceBasisQuantity may be specified with the following units of measures: kilogram, gram , metre, millimetre, millilitre, litre, square metre, cubic metres,piece.

r521.en: If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '752' (Sweden), additionalTradeItemIdentificationValue ('SUPPLIER_ASSIGNED', 'DISTRIBUTOR_ASSIGNED') may not have the same value on more than one Trade Item in the same item hierarchy. This rule applies when isTradeItemAnOrderableUnit is equal to 'true'.

r523.en: If dataCarrierTypeCode equals ('EAN_13', 'UPC_A' or 'UPC_E') then first digit of gtin shall equal '0'.
r523.fr: Si le type de code à barres est égal à ('EAN_13', 'UPC_A' ou 'UPC_E'), le premier chiffre de gtin doit être égal à '0'.

r524.en: netContent is not used. This attribute shall be used if isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals ‘true’ for targetMarketCountryCode name.

r526.en: If provided, Ordering Lead Time must be greater than zero

r528.en: If Target Market is '036' (Australia) and taxTypeCode is equal to 'WET' (Wine Equalisation Tax), then percentageOfAlcoholByVolume must be populated

r529.en: The Price (or Allowance) Basis Quantity must be greater than zero.

r530.en: If QuantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer is used, then QuantityOfLayersPerPallet shall be used for this target market.

r531.en: functionalName may not contain the same text as brandName or descriptiveSizeDimension when IsTradeItemAConsumerUnit is equal to 'true'.

r532.en: functionalName may not contain the same text as descriptive size. When validating, a space character should be added before and after descriptive size before searching for the same text in functionalName. This rule applies when isTradeItemAConsumerUnit is equal to 'true' and targetMarket is equal to '752' (Sweden)

r533.en: If targetMarket is equal to '528' (Netherlands) then dutyFeeTaxCategoryCode is required but was not provided.

r534.en: If targetMarket is equal to '036' (Australia') then the partyReceivingPrivateData field cannot be populated when the communityVisibilityDate has been populated.

r536.en: If populated, minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfArrival must be greater than zero.

r537.en: If populated, minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfProduction must be greater than zero.

r539.en: Value in grossWeight must be greater than or equal to value in netContent if this is given as weight. Allowance must be made for different units of measure.

r540.en: Value in quantityofNextLowerLevelTradeItem may not exceed 2 when the pallet type is any type of full size pallet and the child item's pallet type is any type of half size pallet. Full size pallets are: ISO 1 Pallet (code 11)

r541.en:
{insert_attribute_name} contains an invalid value. Used code {insert_incorrect_value} is not included in the relevant code list”.
Error message example: “Contact type code is not valid. Used code MY_INVALID_CONTACT_CODE is not included in the relevant code list.”

r542.en: For all attributes for which the Trade Item Standard identifies a code list and the Agency is a code representing GS1, only the values in that code list are valid in the GDS network.

r543.en: If individualUnitMinimum and/or individualUnitMaximum are populated, then isTradeItemABaseUnit must be 'true'

r544.en: If isTradeItemABaseUnit is equal to 'false', then individualUnitMinimum and/or individualUnitMaximum should never be populated.

r549.en: grossWeight shall be included at all levels where isTradeItemNonphysical does not equal 'true'.

r550.en: If specialItemCode does not equal DYNAMIC_ASSORTMENT, then the grossWeight of the GTIN MUST BE greater than 96% of the sum of that GTIN’s packagingWeight plus the sum of the grossWeight of all next lower-level child items (whether or not packagingWeight Is populated in the child items). The formula is: [Parent GTIN Gross Weight] > 96% * ((sum of [Parent GTIN Packaging Weight]) + ([Parent GTIN Qty of Next Lower Level] * (Child GTIN Gross Weight])) NOTE :This allowance of 4% in the sum, is due to some configurations where part of the packaging of child items is removed, such as in displays. NOTE Approval of this VR will mean that VR 97 is replaced by this rule.

r554.en: If tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode is 'TRANSPORT_LOAD', and the item has a parent, then the tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of the parent item can only be 'TRANSPORT_LOAD'.

r555.en: If tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode is 'PALLET', and the item has a parent, then the tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of the parent item can only be 'TRANSPORT_LOAD' or 'PALLET'.

r557.en: If tradeItemUnitDescriptor is 'PALLET', and the item has a children, then the tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of the children can never be 'TRANSPORT_LOAD'.

r558.en: If tradeItemUnitDescriptor is 'CASE', and the item has a parent, then the tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of the parent item can never be 'BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH' or 'PACK_OR_INNER_PACK.'

r559.en: f tradeItemUnitDescriptor is 'CASE' and the item has a children, then the tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of the children can never be 'TRANSPORT_LOAD', 'MIXED_MODULE' or 'PALLET'.

r560.en: If tradeItemUnitDescriptor is 'PACK_OR_INNERPACK' and the item has a parent, then the tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of the parent item can never be 'BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH'.

r561.en: If tradeItemUnitDescriptor is 'PACK_OR_INNERPACK', and the item has (a) child(ren), then the tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of the children can never be 'TRANSPORT_LOAD', 'PALLET', 'MIXED_MODULE', 'DISPLAY_SHIPPER' or 'CASE'.

r565.en: stackingFactor is mandatory for Despatch Units in target market '752' (Sweden).

r566.en: If populated, one iteration has to be in Swedish for functionalName for TM '752' (Sweden).

r567.en: If populated, one iteration has to be in Swedish for descriptiveSize for TM '752' (Sweden).

r568.en: If populated, one iteration has to be in Swedish for descriptionShort for TM '752' (Sweden).

r569.en: For this target market (#targetMarketCountryCode#), fileFormatName is mandatory, if uniformResourceIdentifier is used and referencedFileTypeCode equals the value 'PRODUCT_IMAGE'.

r570.en: fileName is mandatory if uniformResourceIdentifier is used and typeOf Information contains the value 'PRODUCT_IMAGE'.

r571.en: The dutyFeeTaxAgencyCode must be '9SE' if target market is '752' (Sweden).

r572.en: lastChangeDateTime for a trade item may not be a date in the future.

r575.en: For Country Of Sale Code (#targetMarketCountryCode#), if the Global Product Category Code of the product is not one of the brick codes in segment '51000000' (Healthcare) and Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true', then the GTIN (#gtin#) SHALL not begin with values "1" through "9".

r576.en: If isNonGTINLogisticUnitPackedIrregularly is equal to 'false' then value in quantityOfTradeItemsPerPallet must be equal to value in quantityOfLayersPerPallet multiplied by value in quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer

r583.en: importClassificationTypeCode and importClassificationValue are used in pairs. If one is populated the other is required.

r584.en: importClassificationTypeCode and importClassificationValue are used in pairs. If one is populated the other is required.

r585.en: If quantityOfLayersPerPallet is greater than zero, then quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer shall be greater than zero for this target market.

r586.en: If targetMarket equals '840' (US) and growingMethodCode equals 'ORGANIC' then organicClaimAgency and organicTradeItemCode MUST not be empty.

r590.en: tradeItemDescription is missing. The long description (tradeItemDescription) is mandatory for targetMarketCountryCode Name.

r594.en: platformTypeCode is missing. If targetMarketCountryCode does not equal ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand) or 752 (Sweden)) it is mandatory to specify the pallet type (platformTypeCode) when tradeItemUnitDescriptor is equal to 'PALLET' or ‘MIXED_MODULE’

r597.en: For target market '250' (France) and the tradeItemTradeChannelCode is equal to 'GROCERY', the invoice Name (invoiceName) is mandatory for all invoice unit (isTradeItemAnInvoiceUnit equals 'true').

r598.en: For target market '249' (France) or '250' (France) and tradeItemTradeChannelCode equals 'GROCERY', the country of origin is required for all base units (tradeItemUnitDescriptor equals 'BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH').

r603.en: When target market code equals '249' (France) or '250' (France) and tradeItemTradeChannelCode equals 'GROCERY' , the agency maintaining the list of taxes is GS1 France. (dutyFeeTaxAgencyCode = '65').

r606.en: The start availability date (startAvailabilityDateTime) is mandatory when target market code equals '250'(France) or '249' (France) and tradeItemTradeChannelCode is equal to 'GROCERY' .

r613.en: The free quantity (freeQuantityOfProduct) in a promotional offer shall not exceed the Content net (netContent), when expressed in the same measurementUnitCode.

r616.en: If the net drained weight is populated (drainedWeight) the net weight must be less than or equal to its net weight (netWeight).

r617.en: If a trade item has a child trade item (childTradeItem.tradeItemIdentification), the amount associated with this child (childTradeItem.tradeItemIdentification) must be informed and be greater than 0.

r618.en: If target Market equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)), consumer units for alcoholic beverages (Cls '50202200' , except Brick '10000142') shall have a dutyFeeTaxTypeCode equal to '3001000002008' (Rights on water and beer), '3001000002244' (Tax on cider), '3001000002312' (Rights of alcohol) or '3001000002329'.

r631.en: If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '372' (Ireland) and if isTradeItemABaseUnit is equal to 'true' and ((gpcCategoryCode is in Class ('50202200' or '50211500') and does not equal ('10000142', '10000143', '10000303' or '10000584')) then at least one iteration of AdditionalTradeItemClassification must have a value with additionalTradeItemClassificationCodeListCode equal to '57'(REV).

r632.en: IF depositValueEffectiveDate is populated then returnablePackageDepositIdentification or returnablePackageDepositAmount MUST be populated.

r633.en: If targetMarketCountryCode is not equal to '036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand) and productionVariantEffectiveDateTime is not empty then productionVariantDescription must not be empty.

r634.en: returnableAssetCapacityContent is missing. For Target Markets '040' (Austria) and '276' (Germany) returnableAssetCapacityContent is mandatory if returnableAssetEmpty equals 'true'.

r635.en: discontinuedDateTime shall not be older than effectiveDateTime minus six months. E.g. effectiveDatetime = 1 December 2016, then discontinuedDateTime = 15 May 2016 fails, 1 June 2016 passes.

r636.en: A trade item can not be replaced temporarily by itself ('REPLACED_BY')

r637.en: A trade item can not be substituted temporarily by itself ('SUBSTITUTED_BY')

r638.en: A trade item can not be substituted temporarily by itself ('EQUIVALENT')

r639.en: Dependent Proprietary Trade Item (''DEPENDENT_PROPRIETARY') must not equal TradeItem/tradeItemIdentification.

r640.en: A trade item can not be the same as the item variant master ('ITEM_VARIANT_MASTER')

r641.en: A trade item can not be replaced temporarily by itself ('REPLACED').

r642.en: If the Trade Item is a consumer unit, and the target market country code is '840' (US), the type of bar code [dataCarrierTypeCode] is mandatory

r1000.en: The trade item must have an information provider.

r1001.en: The name of the information provider must be populated.

r1004.en: The startAvailabilityDateTime must be populated for the trade item.

r1008.en: isTradeItemAConsumerUnit must be populated for the trade item.

r1010.en: isTradeItemADespatchUnit must be populated for the trade item.

r1011.en: isTradeItemAnInvoiceUnit must be populated for the trade item.

r1012.en: isTradeItemAnOrderableUnit must be populated for the trade item.

r1013.en: isTradeItemAVariableUnit must not be empty for the trade item.

r1017.en: If the drained weight is populated (drainedWeight) it must be less than or equal to the gross weight (grossWeight).

r1018.en: targetMarket for a child item cannot be more specific than for the parent. Example: If parent item targetmarketCountryCode is equal to '840' then child item cannot have a targetMarketSubdivisonCode.

r1020.en: Category code and gtin cannot be an input together.

r1022.en: If cancelledDateTime is not empty then discontinuedDateTime must be empty.

r1023.en: The receiving data pool must not fail valid extensions to an existing document.

r1024.en: GRAI check digit is not valid.

r1025.en: For Country Of Sale Code (#targetMarketCountryCode#) then packagingMaterialTypeCode and packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity are used in pairs. I.e. if one is populated the other one must be populated, also.

r1026.en: The Unit of Measure used for the trade item height must be from same measuring system (e.g. metric) across whole hierarchy.

r1027.en: The Unit of Measure used for the trade item width must be from same measuring system (e.g. metric) across whole hierarchy.

r1028.en: The Unit of Measure used for the trade item depth must be from same measuring system (e.g. metric) across whole hierarchy.

r1029.en: The Unit of Measure used for the trade item netweight must be from same measuring system (e.g. metric) across whole hierarchy.

r1030.en: The Unit of Measure used for the trade item grossWeight must be from same measuring system (e.g. metric) across whole hierarchy.

r1031.en: The Unit of Measure used for the trade item packagingWeight must be from same measuring system (e.g. metric) across whole hierarchy.

r1032.en: The Unit of Measure used for the trade item drainedWeight must be from same measuring system (e.g. metric) across whole hierarchy.

r1034.en: If fatPercentageInDryMatter is not empty then value must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 100.00.

r1035.en: The data source gln does not exist in the Global Registry.

r1037.en: cancelDateTime shall be an earlier date than yesterday’s date.

r1038.en: discontinuedDateTime and cancelledDateTime shall not be used simultaneously .

r1039.en: If additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode equals 'GTIN_13' then associated additionalTradeItemIdentification value must have 13 digits and must have a valid check digit.

r1040.en: If additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode equals 'GTIN_8' then associated additionalTradeItemIdentification value must have 8 digits and must have a valid check digit.

r1041.en: If additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode equals 'GTIN_14' then associated additionalTradeItemIdentification value must have 14 digits and must have a valid check digit.

r1042.en: If additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode equals 'GTIN_12' then associated additionalTradeItemIdentification value must have 12 digits and must have a valid check digit.

r1043.en: If nutrientTypeCode is not empty then dailyValueIntakePercent or quantityContained must not be empty.

r1044.en: If ChildTradeItem/gtin is not empty then quantityOfChildren and totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem must not be empty.

r1045.en: There must be at most one iteration of languageSpecificBrandName per languageCode.

r1046.en: There must be at most one iteration of languageSpecificSubBrandName per languageCode.

r1047.en: There must be at most one iteration of descriptionShort per languageCode.

r1048.en: There must be at most one iteration of invoiceName per languageCode.

r1049.en: There must be at most one iteration of packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity per Unit Of Measurement.

r1050.en: There must be at most one iteration of colourDescription per languageCode.

r1051.en: There must be at most one iteration of unitsPerTradeItem per measurementUnitCode

r1052.en: There must be at most one iteration of priceComparisonMeasurement per measurementUnitCode

r1053.en: There must be at most one iteration of orderingLeadTime per measurementUnitCode

r1054.en: There must be at most one iteration of totalScreenArea per measurementUnitCode

r1055.en: There must be at most one iteration of warrantyDescription per languageCode.

r1056.en: There must be at most one iteration of functionalName per languageCode.

r1057.en: If Packagingmaterial/packagingMaterialTypeCode is not equal to ('COMPOSITE' or 'LAMINATED_CARTON' or 'OTHER' or 'PAPER_PAPERBOARD')then CompositeMaterialDetail class must be empty.

r1058.en: Use of temperatureTypeQualifierCode is mandatory in case any other attribute of the TradeItemTemperatureInformation class is not empty.

r1060.en: If the TradeItemInformation class is repeated, the values of productionVariantDescription and productionVariantEffectiveDateTime must be different in all instances.

r1061.en: The maximum length of data type StringAttributeValuePair is 5000 characters.

r1062.en: If class NonPackagedSizeDimension is used then descriptiveSizeDimension, sizeDimension or sizeCode shall be used.

r1063.en: The brandName must not be empty unless the context is 'Pharmaceuticals' or 'Medical Devices'

r1065.en: The functionalName must not be empty.

r1066.en: If the target market is equal to '276' (Germany) or '372' (Ireland) then functionalName must always be populated for all contexts.

r1067.en: There must be at most one iteration of ingredientStatement per languageCode

r1068.en: There must be at most one iteration of ingredientName per languageCode (per ingredient).

r1069.en: There must be at most one iteration of compulsoryAdditivesLabelInformation per languageCode.

r1070.en: There must be at most one iteration of servingSuggestion per languageCode.

r1071.en: There must be at most one iteration of dailyValueIntakeReference per languageCode.

r1072.en: There must be at most one iteration of servingSizeDescription per languageCode.

r1073.en: There must be at most one iteration of preparationConsumptionPrecautions per languageCode.

r1074.en: There must be at most one iteration of preparationInstructions per languageCode.

r1075.en: There must be at most one iteration of dietTypeDescription per languageCode

r1076.en: If maximumHumidityPercentage and/or minimumHumidityPercentage are not empty then humidityQualifierCode must not be empty.

r1078.en: If TradeItem/brandOwner/PartyInRole/gln is not empty then PartyInRole/PartyRoleCode must be empty.

r1079.en: If TradeItem/informationProviderOfTradeItem/PartyInRole/gln is not empty then PartyInRole/PartyRoleCode must be empty.

r1080.en: If TradeItem/manufacturerOfTradeItem/PartyInRole/gln and/or TradeItem/manufacturerOfTradeItem/PartyInRole/partyName is not empty then PartyInRole/PartyRoleCode must be empty.

r1081.en: All iterations of TradeItemInformation after the first must have a productionVariantDescription and productionVariantEffectiveDateTime

r1082.en: If cataloguePrice/TradeItemPrice/tradeItemPrice is not empty then tradeItemPriceTypeCode must be empty.

r1083.en: If TradeItemPriceInformation/+suggestedRetailPrice/TradeItemPrice/tradeItemPrice is not empty then tradeItemPriceTypeCode must be empty.

r1084.en: If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '528' (Netherlands) and isPackagingMarkedReturnable is equal to 'True' then returnablePackageDepositCode must not be empty.

r1085.en: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/height must not be less than 80 percent of the current version height.

r1086.en: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/width must not be less than 80 percent of the current version width.

r1087.en: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/depth must not be less than 80 percent of the current version depth.

r1088.en: If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/grossWeight must must not be less than 80 percent of the current version grossWeight.

r1089.en: partyRoleCode is mandatory in tradeItem/PartyInRole class.

r1090.en: If ProductYieldInformation/productYield used then PreparationServing/preparationTypeCode shall be used.

r1091.en: If ProductYieldInformation/productYield is not empty then ProductYieldInformation/productYieldTypeCode must not be empty.

r1092.en: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and tradeItemTradeChannelCode equals 'GROCERY' and isTradeItemNonPhysical does not equal 'TRUE' then the hierarchy shall have at least one iteration where isTradeItemADespatchUnit equals 'TRUE'

r1093.en: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and tradeItemTradeChannelCode equals 'GROCERY' then maximum one iteration of the same dutyFeeTaxTypeCode shall exist for the same Trade Item

r1102.en: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and tradeItemTradeChannelCode equals 'GROCERY' and gpcCategoryCode equals '10000424' and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'TRUE' then at least one iteration of priceComparisonContentTypeCode shall equal 'PER_KILOGRAM' or 'PER_LITRE'

r1104.en: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and tradeItemTradeChannelCode equals 'GROCERY' and if priceComparisonContentTypeCode equals 'PER_PIECE' then priceComparisonMeasurement shall be an Integer

r1105.en: For Country Of Sale Code (#targetMarketCountryCode#), if priceComparisonMeasurement is used, then priceComparisonMeasurement shall be greater than 0.

r1107.en: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'PALLET' and platformTypeCode equals '10', then depth shall be between and including ('800 MMT' or '31.50 IN') and ('1600 MMT' or '63 IN') and width shall be between and including (' '600 MMT' or '23.62 IN') and ('1200 MMT' or '47.24 IN').

r1108.en: When populating netWeight, drainedWeight or grossWeight, the associated measurementUnitCode shall be of the Unit Of Measure Classification 'MASS' e.g. "MMT" would fail as a value.

r1109.en: If (TradeItemDimensions/height or TradeItemDimensions/depth or TradeItemDimensions/width ) is not empty, then the unit of measurement must be expressed in a UOM from the Unit Of Measure Classification 'DIMENSIONS'

r1110.en: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and tradeItemTradeChannelCode equals 'GROCERY' and priceComparisonContentTypeCode equals 'PER_LITRE' then the associated measurementUnitCode of priceComparisonMeasurement and of one iteration of netContent shall be from the Unit Of Measure Classification 'VOLUME'

r1111.en: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and tradeItemTradeChannelCode equals 'GROCERY' and dutyFeeTaxTypeCode equals '3001000002282' then dutyFeeTaxRate shall be empty and dutyFeeTaxAmount shall be used.

r1112.en: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and tradeItemTradeChannelCode equals 'GROCERY' and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals'PALLET', then TradeItemMeasurements/height shall be less than or equal to '3 METERS'.

r1113.en: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and (TradeItemMeasurements/height or TradeItemMeasurements/width or TradeItemMeasurements/depth) is not empty and the associated measurementUnitCode does not equal 'MMT', then its associated value shall not have more than 3 decimal positions.

r1114.en: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and tradeItemTradeChannelCode equals 'GROCERY' and (TradeItemMeasurements/height or TradeItemMeasurements/width or TradeItemMeasurements/depth) is not empty and the associated measurementUnitCode equals ''CMT', then its associated value shall not have more than 1 decimal position.

r1115.en: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and (TradeItemMeasurements/height or TradeItemMeasurements/width or TradeItemMeasurements/depth) is not empty and the associated measurementUnitCode equals ''MMT'', then its associated value shall not have a decimal position. E.g. '1000.6 MMT' fails, '1000 MMT' passes.

r1116.en: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and tradeItemTradeChannelCode equals 'GROCERY' and priceComparisonContentTypeCode equals 'PER_KILOGRAM' and netWeight is populated, then priceComparisonMeasurement and netWeight shall be equivalent.

r1117.en: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and tradeItemTradeChannelCode equals 'GROCERY' and priceComparisonContentTypeCode equals 'DRAINED_WEIGHT' and drainedWeight is populated, then priceComparisonMeasurement and drainedWeight shall be equivalent.

r1122.en: uDIDPublishDate shall be today's date or in the future, if CIN is sent with documentCommand "ADD"

r1123.en: uDIDPublishDate shall not be changed once the current populated date has been reached.

r1124.en: If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'PALLET' and platformTypeCode equals '49', then TradeItemMeasurements/depth shall be between and including ('610 MMT' or '24.02 IN') and ('1220 MMT' or '48.04 IN') and TradeItemMeasurements/width shall be between and including ('508 MMT' or '20 IN') and ('1016 MMT' or '40 IN').

r1275.en: When using the FoodAndBeverageIngredient class the attributes depend on either ingredientName or grapeVarietyCode being used. Neither ingredientName nor grapeVarietyCode were used.

r1277.en: If tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode is equal to 'MIXED_MODULE' and parent item exists then parent item tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode must equal 'TRANSPORT_LOAD', 'PALLET', or 'MIXED_MODULE'.

r1278.en: If tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode is equal to 'MIXED_MODULE' then child item tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode must not equal 'TRANSPORT_LOAD' .

r1279.en: If tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'DISPLAY_SHIPPER' then parent item tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode shall not equal 'BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH' or 'PACK_OR_INNER_PACK'.

r1280.en: If tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode is equal to 'DISPLAY_SHIPPER' then child item tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode must not equal 'TRANSPORT_LOAD', 'MIXED_MODULE' or ' PALLET'.

r1281.en:
The format of ingredientSequence must be 'dd.dd.dd…'. Where 'd' must be a digit, always ending in a 'dd' and never having a value of '00'.
E.g. 00 FAILS 01 PASSES 01.00 FAILS 01.01 PASSES 01.01.00 FAILS

r1284.en: Maximum Temperature must be given using unique units of measurement, if multiple temperatures for Temperature Activity Code (#temperatureQualifierCode#), the (#maximumTemperature#) SHALL not be repeated.

r1285.en: Minimum Temperature must be given using unique units of measurement, if multiple temperatures for Temperature Activity Code (#temperatureQualifierCode#), the (#minimumTemperature#) SHALL not be repeated.

r1286.en: There must be at most one iteration of minimumToleranceTemperature per value of temperatureQualifierCode

r1287.en: There must be at most one iteration of maximumToleranceTemperature per value of temperatureQualifierCode

r1288.en: If preliminaryItemStatusCode is equal to 'PRELIMINARY' or 'FINAL' then firstShipDateTime must not be empty.

r1289.en: If firstShipDateTime is less than or equal to current date then preliminaryItemStatusCode must not equal 'PRELIMINARY'

r1290.en: If preliminaryItemStatusCode changes from 'PRELIMINARY' to 'FINAL' and Document Command is equal to CHANGE_BY_REFRESH, then the changedate must be less than or equal to the firstShipDateTime.

r1291.en: If preliminaryItemStatusCode is equal to 'PRELIMINARY' then parent trade item preliminaryItemStatusCode must not equal 'FINAL'.

r1292.en: If preliminaryItemStatusCode equals 'FINAL' or 'PRELIMINARY' then the preliminaryItemStatusCode for the GTIN in all published hierarchies with the same GTIN, GLN and Target Market combination must be the same.

r1293.en: If the Packaging class is used, then either packagingTypeCode or platformTypeCode must not be empty.

r1294.en: If gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyCode is equal to 'GTIN_13' then associated gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyValue value must have 13 digits and must have a valid check digit.

r1295.en: If gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyCode is equal to 'GTIN_8' then associated gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyValue value must have 8 digits and must have a valid check digit.

r1296.en: If gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyCode is equal to 'GTIN_14' then associated gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyValue value must have 14 digits and must have a valid check digit.

r1297.en: If gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyCode is equal to 'GTIN_12' then associated gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyValue value must have 12 digits and must have a valid check digit.

r1299.en: If targetMarketCountryCode does not equal (‘036’ (Australia)) and the association brandowner/PartyInRole is invoked, then brandOwner/gln SHALL be used.

r1300.en: If TargetMarket equals '124' (Canada) and PharmaceuticalIteminformation/PsychotropicSubstance/ExternalCodeValueInformation/externalAgencyName and/or PharmaceuticalIteminformation/PsychotropicSubstance/EnumerationValueInformation/enumerationValue are not empty, then doesSaleOfTradeItemRequireGovernmentalReporting must not be empty.

r1301.en: If fileEffectiveStartDateTime and fileEffectiveEndDateTime are not empty, then fileEffectiveEndDateTime must be greater than fileEffectiveStartDateTime

r1302.en: fileEffectiveStartDateTime is missing. If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('840' (United States) or '124' (Canada)) and uniformResourceIdentifier is used, then fileEffectiveStartDateTime is mandatory.

r1303.en: fileFormatName is missing. If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('840' (United States) or '124' (Canada)) and uniformResourceIdentifier is used, then fieFormatName is mandatory.

r1317.en: If PromotionalItemInformation/nonPromotionalTradeItem/tradeItemIdentification is not empty, then isTradeItemAconsumerUnit must equal "TRUE"

r1321.en: If promotionTypeCode is not empty, then isTradeItemAConsumerUnit must equal "TRUE"

r1323.en: The associated UoM of freeQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem must be one of the associated UoMs of netContent of the child trade item.

r1324.en: If stackingFactor is not empty, it must equal or be greater than '1'

This means that only childNutritionExpirationDateTime is not conditionally mandatory.

r1755.en: The value for level of containment code is not valid; the allowed values are 'CONTAINS', 'FREE_FROM', 'MAY_CONTAIN' for the target market.

r1756.en: The drained weight unit of measure shall contain the value 'KGM' or 'GRM' for the target market.

r1757.en: The quantity contained unit of measurement shall be 'GRM' in case the nutrient type code is 'FAT', 'FASAT', 'FAMSCIS', 'FAPUCIS', 'CHOAVL', 'PRO-', 'FIBTG', 'SALTEQ', 'SUGAR-', 'POLYL' or 'STARCH' for the target market.

r1760.en: The degree of original wort shall have the same value in all levels of this hierarchy for the target market.

r1762.en: An instance of provenance statement with the language code 'nl' shall be filled out for target market Netherlands in case regulatory product name is filled out and the gpc category code equals 10005786.

r1763.en: You should fill out the field quantity contained because you used the field nutrient type code for this target market.

r1764.en: Daily value intake reference shall be filled out in case the nutrient type code equals 'FAT', 'FASAT', 'ENER-', 'CHOAVL', 'PRO-', 'SUGAR-' or 'SALTEQ' and daily value intake percent is filled out for the target market.

r1765.en: If nutrient type code is filled out with 'FASAT', then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'FAT' within the same group for the target market.

r1766.en: If nutrient type code is filled out with 'FAMSCIS', then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'FAT' within the same group, for the target market.

r1767.en: If nutrient type code is filled out with 'FAPUCIS', then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'FAT' within the same group, for the target market.

r1768.en: If nutrient type code is filled out with 'STARCH', then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'CHOAVL' within the same group, for the target market.

r1769.en: If nutrient type code is filled out with 'POLYL', then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'CHOAVL' within the same group, for the target market.

r1770.en: If nutrient type code is filled out with 'SUGAR-’, then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'CHOAVL' for the legally required nutritional table within the same group, for the target market.

r1771.en: The amount of nutrient type code 'NA' multiplied by 2.5 may not deviate more than 10% from the amount of nutrient type code SALTEQ with identical unit of measure in case of consumer units and a measurementPrecisionCode not equal to 'LESS_THAN' for target market Netherlands.

r1772.en: Is packaging marked returnable shall not be 'true' for an empty article for target market Netherlands.

r1773.en: Is packaging marked returnable shall be populated for the target market in case of packed fresh fruits and vegetables.

r1774.en: Is packaging marked returnable shall be populated for the target market in case of packed fresh fruits and vegetables.

r1777.en: Number of smallest units per package shall be greater than 0 (zero).

r1780.en: If preparation state code is used, then regulated product name should be used as well for consumer units.

r1781.en: For batteries the field quantity of batteries built-in shall be greater than 0 (zero) if used. If quantity of batteries built in is not required, please do not populate.

r1782.en: For batteries the field quantity of batteries included shall be greater than 0 (zero) if used. If batteries are not included, please do not populate.

r1783.en: For batteries the field quantity of batteries required shall be greater than 0 (zero) if used. If batteries are not required, please do not populate.

r1784.en: For batteries the field Battery weight shall be greater than 0 (zero), if used.

r1785.en: Battery weight unit of measure shall contain the value 'KGM', 'GRM' or 'MGM'.

r1787.en: For a Nutrient Header class, the Nutrient #nutrientTypeCode# and Measurement Precision Code #measurementPrecisionCode# must be unique.

r101788.en: If multiple product images are provided, then one of them should be identified as the main product image using isPrimaryFile with a value of TRUE, where the referenced file type code = ‘PRODUCT_IMAGE’. For implementation guidance please refer to: LINK to new TIIG section

r10799.en: packagingMarkedDietAllergenCode is a deprecated attribute and shall not be used.

r1798.en: Multiple values for width for each measurement are not allowed.

r1802.en: For Country of Sale Code (#targetMarketCountryCode#), invalid use of aDRDangerousGoodsLimitedQuantitiesCode. aDRDangerousGoodsLimitedQuantitiesCode has been deprecated. Use Dangerous Goods Limited Quantities Code (dangerousGoodsLimitedQuantitiesCode) instead.

r1803.en: One or both of targetConsumerMinimumUsage or targetConsumerMaximumUsage is missing. You must supply one or both of these attributes if you use targetConsumerUsageTypeCode.

r1804.en: Missing consumerSalesConditionTypeCode. For Country of Sale Code (Sweden), the attribute is required for tobacco products.

r1806.en: tradeItemMarketingMessage is missing. For Country of Sale Code (Sweden), it is not permitted to use shortTradeItemMarketingMessage without also using tradeItemMarketingMessage.

r1808.en: packagingRawMaterialCode is missing. When packagingRawMaterialContentPercentage is used, packagingRawMaterialCode must also be used.

r1809.en: For Country of Sale Code (Sweden), sizeTypeCode or sizeDimension is missing. When one is used, the other must be used.

r1810.en: Invalid meaurement unit for colourTemperature: #colourTemperature#. colourTemperature must have 'KEL' (Kelvin) as the measurement unit.

r1811.en: Invalid Meaurement unit for lightOutput: #lightOutput#. For Country of Sale Code (#targetMarketCountryCode#) , lightOutput must have 'B60' (Lumens per square metre) or 'LUX' (Lux) as the measurement unit.

r1812.en: For Country of Sale Code (sweden), if Nutrient Code is used then both Nutrient Basis and Nutrient Basis Type Code must also be used.

r1813.en: For Country of Sale Code (Sweden), one iteration of Feed Composition Statement must be supplied in Swedish.

r1814.en: For Country of Sale Code (Sweden), one iteration of Feed Analytical Constituents Statement must be supplied in Swedish.

r1815.en: For Country of Sale Code (Sweden), one iteration of Feed Additive Statement must be supplied in Swedish.

r1820.en: For Country of Sale Code (France) and the same Tax Type Code cannot be repeated without having a corresponding end date.

r1821.en: For Country Of Sale Code (France) and Customs Classification Type Code equals 'CUSTOMS_TARIFF_NUMBER' then the corresponding Customs Classification Value shall have a value 8 to 13 numeric characters long.

r1822.en: For the target market France, the customs nomenclature code shall have a value [less than or equal to] 13 characters.

r1823.en: For Country Of Sale Code (France) and Pallet Type Code is used, it is mandatory to provide a valid Number of Layers per GTIN for a pallet.

r1824.en: For Country Of Sale Code (France) and bracketQualifier is used, then Bracket Sequence Number shall be used.

r1825.en: For Country Of Sale Code (France), Bracket Sequence Number shall be unique within the same item price type class.

r1826.en: Multiple values for meatPoultryCut for each language are not allowed.

r1827.en: Multiple values for minimumAmountOfAnimalProtein for each measurement are not allowed.

r1828.en: Multiple values for tradeItemSustainabilityStatement for each language are not allowed.

r1829.en: Multiple values for compulsoryAdditionalLabelInformation for each language are not allowed.

r1830.en: For Country of Sale Code (sweden), invalid use of dutyFeeTaxRate. Values cannot differ across the trade item hierarchy when used.

r1831.en: Multiple values for packagingRecyclabilityValue for each measurement are not allowed.

r1834.en: If GTIN for Point of Sale (gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyValue) is used, then there shall be a GTIN for Point of Sale Type Code (gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyCode) used.

r1835.en: When Referenced GTIN Type Code (referencedTradeItemTypeCode) equals 'EQUIVALENT', then each iteration with Referenced GTIN (referencedTradeItem/gtin) SHALL be unique.

r1836.en: When Referenced GTIN Type Code (referencedTradeItemTypeCode) equals 'DEPENDENT_PROPRIETARY', then each iteration with Referenced GTIN (referencedTradeItem/gtin) SHALL be unique.

r1837.en: At least one other attribute in Trade Item Temperature Information class SHALL be used when Temperature Activity Code (temperatureQualifierCode) is used.

r1838.en: At least one other attribute in Trade Item Humidity Information class SHALL be used when humidityQualifierCode is used.

r1839.en: If Additional Legal Product Information Type Code (compulsoryAdditionalLabelInformationTypeCode) is used, then you SHALL use Additional Legal Product Information (compulsoryAdditionalLabelInformation).

r1840.en: Catch Country Code (catchCountryCode) may only be used when Fish Production Method Code (productionMethodForFishAndSeafoodCode) does not equal 'MARINE_FISHERY'.

r1841.en: Catch Country Code (catchCountryCode) may only be used when Catch Area Code (#catchAreaCode#) is one of the inland water codes ('01', '02', '03', '04', '05', '06', '07' or '08').

r1842.en: If Fish Production Method Code (productionMethodForFishAndSeafoodCode) equals 'INLAND_FISHERY', then Catch Area Code (#catchAreaCode#) SHALL be one of the inland water codes ('01', '02', '03', '04', '05', '06', '07' or '08').

r1843.en: Multiple values for additionalTradeItemClassificationCodeDescription for each languageCode are not allowed.
Multiple values for sizeDimenision for each measurement unit code are not allowed.

r1844.en: Multiple values for sizeDimenision for each measurement unit code are not allowed.

r1847.en: For Country of Sale Code (#targetMarketCountryCode#), both seasonalAvailabilityEndDateTime and seasonalAvailabilityStartDateTime SHALL be used.

r1848.en: For Country of Sale Code (#targetMarketCountryCode#), priceComparisonMeasurement SHALL be specified with the following units of measures: kilogram, litre or piece.

r1849.en: For Country of Sale Code (#targetMarketCountryCode#), Price Comparison Quantity (#priceComparisonMeasurement#) is required for food product(s).

r1850.en: For Country of Sale Code (#targetMarketCountryCode#), Trade Item Trade Channel Code (#tradeItemTradeChannelCode#) SHALL be used.

r1851.en: For Country of Sale Code (#targetMarketCountryCode#), Net Mass of Explosives SHALL be specified with the unit of measure of kilogram (KGM).

r1852.en: For initialSterilisationPriorToUseCode (#initialSterilisationPriorToUseCode#) and/or manufacturerSpecifiedAcceptableResterilisationCode (#manufacturerSpecifiedAcceptableResterilisationCode#) shall not equal NOT_STERILISED and is invalidly used.

r1853.en: Multiple values for nutrientNameOnPackage for each language code are not allowed.
